path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 20px; fill: none;

fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 20px;
